headline: Did WTW's New Databricks Integration Quietly Redefine Its Edge in Insurance Analytics Leadership?
summary: Earlier this month, WTW announced the launch of its Radar Connector for Databricks, allowing insurers to securely access, analyze and return data within minutes through a direct integration with the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform. This integration effectively links WTW’s end-to-end insurance pricing and analytics tools with Databricks’ AI and governance capabilities, creating a more efficient ecosystem for data-driven underwriting and pricing decisions. We’ll now examine how this...
